Shortcrust pastry (Pâte brisée)

Prep Time

~10min

Source
=======

Shortcrust pastry (Pâte brisée)

Prep Time:

~10min

Source:
>>>>>>> origin/master

Meilleur du chef

<<<<<<< HEAD

Ingredients

=======

Ingredients

>>>>>>> origin/master

  • 250g flour

  • 125g softened butter (half a pack)

  • 1 pinch salt

  • ~50 ml water room temp

  • (optional: 1 egg yolk)

<<<<<<< HEAD

Preparation

=======

Preparation

>>>>>>> origin/master

  1. flour in a mount and add chunks of softened butter and salt;

  2. mix butter in with fingers;

  3. add egg yolk;

  4. start mixing all the flour while gradually adding water;

  5. fridge for 30min before preparing (if possible)

<<<<<<< HEAD

Freezer storage

=======

Freezer storage

>>>>>>> origin/master

  • To let them thaw nicely, lay the doe flat and make round or rectangular blocs
